availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William V. Archer (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney and commissioner of deeds. Native of Ireland. Attorney in Philadelphia in 1860 and 1862. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Pennsylvania in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Philadelphia County, Philadelphia, Ward 8, p. 145; McElroy's Philadelphia City Directory, 1862 (Philadelphia: Sherman & Co., 1862), p. 14; KYR-0001-007-0332.
